llm_res.rule: ERC721 standard does not specify any conditions or privileges related to the ownership or transfer of tokens beyond the basic ownership tracking and transfer mechanisms.
The function balanceOf(address _owner) should return the account balance of another account with address _owner.

approve - Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value. NOTE: To prevent attack vectors like the one described here and discussed here, clients SHOULD make sure to create user interfaces in such a way that they set the allowance first to 0 before setting it to another value for the same spender. THOUGH The contract itself shouldn’t enforce it, to allow backwards compatibility with contracts deployed before.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
